title: WTT: T213 Coupon Type 3 Matty for CJ Matty
author: mq711

posts.post_title: WTT: T213 Coupon Type 3 Matty for CJ Matty
posts.post_content: I have a T213 Coupon Cigs. type 3 Mathewson PSA 4 that I would like to use towards a trade for a 1915 Cracker Jack Christy Mathewson, psa 2-4. I will gladly pay the difference in value. Please let me know if you are interested and we can exchange scans. Thanks
Still looking for a trade or interested in buying the CJ Matty if anyone wanting to sell one.
